body.raw:
{
    "legalEntityId": "{{data-recipient-id}}-{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
    "legalEntityName": "{{data-recipient-id}} Ltd Pty",
    "accreditationNumber": "123456",
    "industry": "banking",
    "logoUri": "https://mycompany.com/logo.png",
    "dataRecipientBrands": [
        {
            "status": "ACTIVE",
            "dataRecipientBrandId": "brand-{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
            "brandName": "Brand One",
            "logoUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/logo.png",
            "softwareProducts":[
                {
                    "softwareProductId": "software-{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
                    "softwareProductName": "Brand One Software One",
                    "softwareProductDescription": "Brand One Software One Description",
                    "logoUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/software1/logo.png",
                    "status": "ACTIVE",
                    "version": "1.0",
                    "policyUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/software1/policy",
                    "termsUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/software1/terms",
                    "redirectUri": "https://httpbin.org/get",
                    "scope": "bank:accounts.basic:read bank:accounts.detail:read bank:transactions:read bank:payees:read bank:regular_payments:read common:customer.basic:read common:customer.detail:read",
                    "recipientBaseUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1",
                    "jwksUri": "http://cdrregister:8084/helper/JWKS/{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
                    "revocationJwksUri": "{{cdr-register-testharness-host}}/helper/JWKS/{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}/revocation"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]

}

{
  "iss": "software-{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
  "aud": "{{dh-idp-host}}",
  "software_statement": "{{software-ssa}}",
  "token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg": "PS256",

    "authorization_code",
    "client_credentials",
    "refresh_token"
  ],
  "request_object_signing_alg": "PS256",
  "redirect_uris": [
    "https://httpbin.org/get"
  ],
  "token_endpoint_auth_method": "private_key_jwt",
  "response_types": [
    "code id_token"
  ],
  "id_token_signed_response_alg": "PS256",
  "id_token_encrypted_response_alg": "RSA-OAEP",
  "id_token_encrypted_response_enc":"A256GCM"
}

{
    "status": "ACTIVE",
    "legalEntityId": "{{legalEntityId}}",
    "legalEntityName": "{{data-recipient-id}} Ltd Pty",
    "accreditationNumber": "123456",
    "industry": "banking",
    "logoUri": "https://mycompany.com/logo.png",
    "dataRecipientBrands": [
        {
            "status": "ACTIVE",
            "dataRecipientBrandId": "brand-{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
            "brandName": "Brand One",
            "logoUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/logo.png",
            "softwareProducts":[
                {
                    "softwareProductId": "software-{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
                    "softwareProductName": "Brand One Software One",
                    "softwareProductDescription": "Brand One Software One Description",
                    "logoUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/software1/logo.png",
                    "status": "INACTIVE",
                    "version": "1.0",
                    "policyUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/software1/policy",
                    "termsUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1/software1/terms",
                    "redirectUri": "https://httpbin.org/get",
                    "scope": "bank:accounts.basic:read bank:accounts.detail:read bank:transactions:read bank:payees:read bank:regular_payments:read common:customer.basic:read common:customer.detail:read",
                    "recipientBaseUri": "https://mycompany.com/brand1",
                    "jwksUri": "http://cdrregister:8084/helper/JWKS/{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}",
                    "revocationJwksUri": "{{cdr-register-testharness-host}}/helper/JWKS/{{flowUUID-datarecipient}}/revocation"
                }
            ]
